text: aṉṟiyum allāhviṉ pātaiyil nīṅkaḷ celavu ceyyātirukka uṅkaḷukku eṉṉa nērntatu? Vāṉaṅkaḷ, pūmiyiluḷḷavaṟṟiṉ aṉantara pāttiyatai allāhvuṭaiyatē! (Makkā) veṟṟikku muṉṉar celavu ceytu, pōriṭṭavarkaḷukku uṅkaḷil niṉṟum (evarum) camamāka māṭṭār, (makkāviṉ veṟṟikkup) piṉ, celavu ceytu pōriṭṭavarkaḷaiviṭa, avarkaḷ pataviyāl mikavum makattāṉavarkaḷ, eṉiṉum allāh ellōrukkumē aḻakāṉataiyē vākkaḷittirukkiṉṟāṉ. Aṉṟiyum allāh nīṅkaḷ ceypavaṟṟai naṉku terintavaṉ
